cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 275 miles SSW of Nantucket, Massachusetts
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating northeastward, passing southeast of New England tonight, then crossing Nova Scotia late Saturday before moving into the North Atlantic
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or over eastern Nova Scotia

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch still posted for portions of New Brunswick and Newfoundland; none along the Delaware coast
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning eastern Nova Scotia; Tropical Storm Warning Cape Cod, Marthaâ€™s Vineyard/Nantucket, eastern Maine and portions of Atlantic Canada
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Coast from Cape Cod northward to Atlantic Canada; Mid-Atlantic impacts have ended
weather_observation.wind: Occasional gusts below tropical-storm force possible this evening, diminishing overnight
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected; previous surge warnings for Delaware Bay have been discontinued

weather_observation.other_hazards: Hazardous surf and rip currents along the Delaware and New Jersey beaches through tonight
